spring.model

Class RESTSchema<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • spring.model.RESTSchema<T>

  • public class RESTSchema<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    This represents a pagination object of generic type T

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RESTSchema()

      See the constructor above for more information.
      RESTSchema(java.util.Collection<T> collection, java.lang.Integer page, java.lang.Integer limit, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, java.util.Comparator<T> comparator)
      Creates a pagination object for the collection if either page or limit is null: 1) the data field of the schema will be set to a copy of the collection 2) schema.data will be equal to the size of the collection 3) all the other fields will be null if both page and limit are not null: 1) schema.data will contain the sublist [page*limit, page*limit + limit[.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RESTSchema

        public RESTSchema()

      • RESTSchema

        public RESTSchema(java.util.Collection<T> collection,
                  java.lang.Integer page,
                  java.lang.Integer limit,
                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                  java.util.Comparator<T> comparator)
        Creates a pagination object for the collection

        if either page or limit is null: 1) the data field of the schema will be set to a copy of the collection 2) schema.data will be equal to the size of the collection 3) all the other fields will be null

        if both page and limit are not null: 1) schema.data will contain the sublist [page*limit, page*limit + limit[. This is a copy of the collection. The collection will be sorted based on the UUID of the objects t 2) pagination.previous/pagination.next will be null if there is no previous/next page 2) All other attributes of pagination will contain valid values

        The data will be sorted based on the hashcode

        Parameters:
        collection - the full collection that has to be paginated
        page - if null data of the pagination will be set to collection
        limit - if null data of the pastination will be set to collection
        request - request of the HTTP request
        comparator - specifies how the elements should be sorted

      • RESTSchema

        public RESTSchema(java.util.Collection<T> collection,
                  java.lang.Integer page,
                  java.lang.Integer limit,
                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        See the constructor above for more information. The elements will be sorted based on the hashcode to enforce the order of the elements.
